item.description: Sorry for the last minute notice, but I wanted to get something going! Come join an existing Saturday morning dog playgroup in beautiful Turner's Falls. Unity Park is across the street from one end of the Canalside Rail Trail, and next to the Connecticut River just north of the waterfalls from which Turners Falls gets its name. Depending on weather and attendance, we can play in the fields or walk along the trail. Bundle up, it's usually windy!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a black lab with a blue leash and a white PT Cruiser

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Playing by the River
